definition: see a worthy, think to imitate (idiom, from Analects); emulate the virtuous/Follow the example of a virtuous and wise teacher.
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to think/to consider
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to choose the right course and follow it (idiom)
to have a sense of shame
to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
to accept criticism gladly (humble expr.)/to be happy when one's errors are pointed out
study tirelessly (idiom, from Analects)
to seek the cause in oneself rather than sb else
lit. drain away filth and bring in fresh water (idiom); fig. dispel evil and usher in good/eliminate vice and exalt virtue
to practice diligently/to act energetically
teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom)/action speaks louder than words
pinyin: shen1 jiao4 sheng4 yu2 yan2 jiao4

definition: to be lenient with others (idiom)
doing good is like a hard climb, doing evil is like an easy fall (idiom)
pinyin: cong2 shan4 ru2 deng1 , cong2 e4 ru2 beng1

definition: proactive
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to enhance/to promote/to enrich
receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
filial piety and fraternal duty
